Hydras:

Preston Carroll

ups.com 
Subject: Re: BlackFortress


  
> Hydras open the comlink  to Cycl=
onus "I dont want that any bot either maximal, autobot  or Predacon can ent=
er in that area with out permission of me or Perceptor; I want that you fil=
l up Rodimus the situation in the ark... something is wrong there"

"Yes si=
r." Cyclonus said, falling into his old pattern of taking command.

Cyclonu=
s continued down the halls within the Blackfortress, his long
ground eating=
 strides taking him to the research center. He glanced
over at Scourge, "Pe=
rhaps you should keep an optic on the outside base
security. There's no tel=
ling what those Autobots and Maximals are up
to."

Scourge nodded, his opti=
cs dimming as he turned a corner and began
striding quickly away from Cyclo=
nus, towards the exterior doors.

Even as Scourge walked away, Rodimus walk=
ed up, his dark colors and
demeanor seeming to dim even the bright lights o=
f the hall.

Cyclonus turned and looked at him, his head tilting as he took=
 in the
obvious hostility radiating from Rodimus. "Come Rodimus, I have muc=
h
to explain to you, and we only have a short period of time."

Rodimus fol=
lowed after Cyclonus, his anger evident in each step that
he took, however =
for the moment he managed to keep his anger in check.
"Yes." he said, as if=
 through clenched teeth, and said nothing more as
he fell in step behind Cy=
clonus, his optics staring at the back of
Cyclonus' head.

Cyclonus, for hi=
s part continued down the hall, as if totally unaware
of Rodimus' hostility=
.

OOC: Keep in mind, now that the live feed is down, Hydras only has
acces=
s to whatever sensors and such the fortress normally has.

Preston
